someoneElse.label: Another person living at my address

niNumber.label: National Insurance number
niNumber.hint: For example, ‘QQ 12 34 56 C’. You can find this on the back of your biometric residence permit (BRP).

homeOfficeReference.label: Home Office reference number
homeOfficeReference.hint: For example, ‘A1234567’ or 'VPR1234'. You can find this on your asylum application letter from the Home Office. It's sometimes called 'Case ID'.

convicted.legend: Some crimes could affect your application, but we won’t use this information for anything else.

partnerNiNumber.label: National Insurance number
partnerNiNumber.hint: For example, ‘QQ 12 34 56 C’. You can find this on the back of your partner's biometric residency permit (BRP).

convictedJoint.legend: Some crimes could affect your application, but we won’t use this information for anything else.

incomeTypes.hint: Select all options that apply to you.

universal_credit.label: Universal Credit
universal_credit.hint: Enter the amount you expect to receive if you haven’t yet had a payment.

universalCreditAmount.label: Total Universal Credit amount per month

childBenefitAmount.label: Total child benefit amount per month

housingBenefitAmount.label: Total housing benefit amount per month

otherIncomeAmount.label: Total other income amount per month

combinedIncomeTypes.hint: Select all options that apply to you.

universal_credit.label: Universal Credit
universal_credit.hint: Enter the amount you expect to receive if you haven’t yet had a payment.

combinedUniversalCreditAmount.label: Total Universal Credit amount per month

combinedChildBenefitAmount.label: Total child benefit amount per month

combinedHousingBenefitAmount.label: Total housing benefit amount per month

combinedOtherIncomeAmount.label: Total other income amount per month

outgoingTypes.hint: Select all options that currently apply to you.

other.label: Other
other.hint: This includes payments for credit card debt and loans.

combinedHouseholdBillsAmount.label: Total utility bills amount per month

combinedFoodToiletriesAndCleaningSupplie.label: Total food, toiletries and cleaning supplies amount per month

combinedMobilePhoneAmount.label: Total mobile phone amount per month

combinedClothingAndFootwearAmount.label: Total clothing and footwear amount per month

combinedUniversalCreditDeductionsAmount.label: Total Universal Credit deductions per month

combinedOutgoingTypes.hint: Select all options that currently apply to you.

other.label: Other
other.hint: This includes payments for credit card debt and loans.

householdBillsAmount.label: Total utility bills amount per month

foodToiletriesAndCleaningSuppliesAmount.label: Total food, toiletries and cleaning supplies amount per month

mobilePhoneAmount.label: Total mobile phone amount per month

clothingAndFootwearAmount.label: Total clothing and footwear amount per month

universalCreditDeductionsAmount.label: Total Universal Credit deductions per month

debts.hint: This includes universal credit advance payment, credit card debt and loans.

amount.label: Loan amount
amount.hint: You can apply for a minimum of £100 and a maximum of £500.

jointAmount.label: Loan amount
jointAmount.hint: You can apply for a minimum of £100 and a maximum of £780.

purposeTypes.hint: Select all options that apply to you.

housing.label: Housing
housing.hint: Deposit, rent payment or moving costs.

essential_items.label: Essential items
essential_items.hint: For example, furniture, fridge, curtains or carpets.

basic_living_costs.label: Basic living costs
basic_living_costs.hint: For example, food or household bills.

accountNumber.label: Account number
accountNumber.hint: Must be between 6 and 8 digits long

rollNumber.label: Building society or credit union number (if you have one)
rollNumber.hint: You can find this on your card, statement or passbook

phone.label: Mobile phone number
phone.hint: For international numbers include the country code

likelyToMove.legend: Are you likely to move to another address in the next 4 weeks?

no_internet.label: I don’t have access to the internet

english_not_first_language.label: English is not my first language

not_confident.label: I’m not confident to answer the questions correctly

faster.label: It was faster to complete the application

health_condition.label: I have a health condition which makes completing the form online difficult

helpContactTypes.hint: We may need to get in contact with them if we need more information. Select at least one option.
